author: Ed Kilgore
title: Against All Logic and Reason, Next Week’s Wisconsin Primary Slouches Ahead
description: A federal judge attacked both the GOP legislature and Democratic governor for refusing to delay the primary, as he liberalized voting by mail.
content: One by one, states scheduled to hold presidential or down-ballot primaries during the coronavirus pandemic have either postponed their events or systematically reformatted them to depend entirely on voting by mail. But against all logic and reason, thanks in … [+5419 chars]
